price: 14. Y aunque abriéramos para ellos una puerta en el cielo por donde pudieran ascendera él sin cesar (hasta contemplar las maravillas del reino de Al-lah, no creerían),
arabic: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaw fataḥnā ʿalayhim bāban mina al-samāi faẓallū fīhi yaʿrujūna
